11.content:
You find a red remote on the floor and decide to pick it up. You see on the back that it says:

"THIS IS A SPECIAL REMOTE. IT CAN BE USED TO DO MANY DIFFERENT THINGS WHEN YOU POINT IT AT SOMETHING AND PICK IT UP."

You see a woman in a suit walking. You also see a man jogging. You are by a gas station. What should you do?
11.title: Male

111.content: You say hi to the woman, but she keeps walking. What should you do?
111.title: Interact with woman

1111.content:
You use the remote on her, pointing it at her and pressing a button. The bar near the top of the remote has words on it. It says: What would you like to do?

Choice One: Control her mind
Freeze her
1111.title: Use the remote on her

11111.content:
You control her mind. "Command me, master," she says.
What do you want to say?
11111.title: Control her mind

111111.content:
"Go to my hotel room," you say.
"Yes master," she says.
You follow her to your hotel room. What do you want to do now?
111111.title: "Go to my hotel room."

1111112.content: You start making out with her as soon as you close the door.
1111112.title: Other

11112.content: You freeze her. She's not covered in ice, nor is she cold, but she is stuck, unable to move. She doesn't know what is going on until you unfreeze her.
11112.title: Freeze her

111122.content: You reach into her pockets and take her wallet, her iPod, and her shoes.
111122.title: Take her stuff

choices: Do something even worse to her.
1111222.content:
You pocket her wallet and jewelry, and hold her shoes low and discreetly in your hands as you turn and quickly walk away. As you reach the next block, you hear the remote beep once, and then a shriek from far behind you. You glance over your shoulder to see that the woman has tripped and fallen upon losing her shoes and is now panicked as she searches for her missing items in a state of bewilderment. You grin slyly and keep on walking.

Across the street you notice another woman, very attractive, walking up the street. She is wearing high heels and a short dress, and carrying an expensive looking purse. Your button pressing finger is itching as you handle the remote.
1111222.title: leave the scene

choices: Try to figure out how to bring the bus back.
11112221.content:
Like a gunslinger in a western movie, you quick draw the remote and freeze her with it. Looking around for witnesses, you jog across the street towards her. While you are in the middle of the road, a bus comes careening down the pavement straight at you. After pausing for one terrifying moment, staring at the oncoming steel monstrosity, you whip the remote out, point it at the bus, and press the first button your finger finds. The bus immediately shrinks to a single point of light, and then winks out.

Gathering yourself and shrugging the near death experience off, you approach the still frozen woman. You quickly pilfer her purse and jewelry, pocketing the latter. Then, you swap the running shoes in your hand with the pumps on her feet. Finally, you remove her dress, take a moment to admire her remaining assets, and walk away.

Once again, a block away, the remote beeps, and the woman unfreezes, and then actually walks all the way to the end of her block before she notices her state of undress and screams her head off. You chuckle at her misfortune as you wrap her stolen dress around her stolen shoes and purse.

You spare a moment to consider that the bus didn't come back when she unfroze, but before you've spent too much thought on the matter, you become distracted by the group of hookers you see waiting at the next corner.
11112221.title: Freeze, rob, and prank her.

111122212.content:
Studying the remote, you think you might have pressed the on/off button when you disappeared the bus. You give it another experimental push. The bus reappears instantly, and before you can blink, it slams into you and then the building behind you.

Congratulations, you are very, very dead. That'll teach you to mess with godlike powers without reading their instruction manual first.
111122212.title: Try to figure out how to bring the bus back.

1112.content:
"I'm talking to you!" you say.
She ignores you and keeps walking. What should you do?
1112.title: walk after her

11121.content: You decide to leave her alone. A man walks by. What should you do?
11121.title: Leave her alone

11122.content:
You decide to follow her. She turns a few corners, then says, "Stop following me!"
What should you do?
11122.title: Follow her

111221.content: You decide to leave her alone. You see another, much nicer-looking woman go by. It is Kim Kardashian, and she's wearing sunglasses.
111221.title: Leave her alone

111222.content: You decide to keep following her, hoping she won't notice you. She turns around and says, "If you don't stop I'LL CALL THE POLICE!"
111222.title: Keep following her

112.content: You jog up to him. What do want to say?
112.title: Interact with man

choices: You grab the nozzle and stick it in his mouth
You slam his face into the gas pump repeatedly
11212.content: You chuck the remote at his forehead,stunning him and then you drag him to a gas pump.
11212.title: Beat him up

choices: You put on a dress and fly away
You pull the man's head off and kick it at the lady
112122.content: You become bloodlusted and smash his face until it's a gory mess
112122.title: You slam his face into the gas pump repeatedly

113.content: You go to the gas station. What to do?
113.title: Go to gas station

11311.content: You take a few bags of Lays chips and quickly stuff them into your pockets. As you walk out, the cashier says, "Hey! You didn't pay for those!" You ignore him. He walks up to you, telling you to drop the items. What should you do?
11311.title: Some chips

113111.content: You decide to ignore him as you walk away. Suddenly he hits you on the back of the head with a baseball bat, and you are on the ground, dazed. What should you do?
113111.title: Ignore him and leave

1132.content: You press a button on the remote. The remote screen asks what you want to do. It gives you 2 choices:
1132.title: Use the remote on cashier

11321.content: What do you want him to do?
11321.title: Control Cashier

choices: Steal money from the cash register
11322.content: You make him leave the store with the remote. As he walks out, you think about what you should do next.
11322.title: Make him leave the store

121.content: You walk into a bank. What should you do?
121.title: bank

1211.content:
You go to the bank person and say, "GIMME ALL YOUR MONEY!"
he says, "Or else what?"
What should you do?
1211.title: Rob the bank

1212.content: You see a cashier and you see a woman walking down the mall. Which one should you use the remote on?
1212.title: Use the remote on someone

choices: Make her give you all your money
12121.content: You press the remote, pointing it to the woman. It gives you two options:
12121.title: woman

choices: Go to a make up center
122.content: You walk into a huge Macy's. There is an elevator to the right, and ecalator up front, and make-up centers all over the place. What should you do?
122.title: mall

choices: Push her out of the way
1221.content:
You go up the escalator. You are at the top when you see your worst enemy from high school blocking you, Jane.
"You can't come through, Veronica," she says.
What do you do?
1221.title: Go up escalator

choices: Sneak in through your ex's window.
12212.content:
"Get out of my way." you warn.

"No." she says.

"Okay." you hit the erase button on the remote control and she disappears. You feel guilty but soon feel okay when you fall to the first floor realizing that you just erased the esculator as well. You seem to think you know what your doing with the remote control so you decide to go to your ex-boyfriends house.

When you get there you
12212.title: Use the remote on her

1222.content:
You go up to a make up center. The lady says "we're closed."
What do you say?
1222.title: Go to a make up center

12221.content: "Be Quiet Ugly!" you say. She gasps, and attacks you with words, saying, "How dare you, you overfashioned fatty!"
12221.title: "Be Quiet Ugly!"

info.brief_description: You can use a remote that can do certain things when you use it. Gps for good additions!
info.description:
PLEASE, TO THOSE READING THIS, PLEASE VISIT MY NEW BLOG, ITS GONNA HAVE TONS OF STORIES, AND YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SUBMIT YOUR STORIES AS WELL. ITS CALLED http://mycoolrificblog.blogspot.com/, so PLEASE CHECK IT OUT! PLEASE!

This is a fun game in which you have a remote control and can do certain things with it, like mind control, steal things, etc. Feel free to submit chapters! Here are some ground rules:
Keep it 13+ or under (You can curse, steal, etc.)
Keep it within the outline of the previous chapter
You can basically do whatever you could in real life
HAVE FUN!


PLEASE READ MY STORIES ESPECIALLY "ADRIAN AND THE SWORD OF NATURE" I AM A NEWBIE AND I NEED PEOPLE TO RATE AND REVIEW MY STORIES ESPECIALLY "ADRIAN AND THE SWORD OF NATURE" IF YOU RATE AND REVIEW THAT STORY AND EMAIL ME AND TELL ME YOU HEARD ABOUT IT FROM THIS INTERACTIVE STORY I WILL GIVE YOU 500-1000 GPS!!!!!
